mapper.sql: A.id as A_id, A.account_name as A_account_name, A.pass_word as A_pass_word, A.name as A_name, A.code as A_code, A.sex as A_sex, A.birthday as A_birthday, A.entry_date as A_entry_date, A.department_id as A_department_id, A.photo_id as A_photo_id, A.phone as A_phone, A.email as A_email, A.telephone as A_telephone, A.contacts as A_contacts, A.contacts_phone as A_contacts_phone, A.address as A_address, A.school as A_school, A.major as A_major, A.graduation as A_graduation, A.education as A_education, A.origin as A_origin, A.race as A_race, A.marriage as A_marriage, A.political as A_political, A.remark as A_remark, A.user_status as A_user_status, A.user_type as A_user_type, A.company_id as A_company_id, A.record_status as A_record_status, A.update_count as A_update_count, A.create_date as A_create_date, A.creator_id as A_creator_id, A.update_date as A_update_date, A.updater_id as A_updater_id, A.branch_company_id as A_branch_company_id
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from sys_user A
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into sys_user (account_name, pass_word, name, code, sex, birthday, entry_date, department_id, photo_id, phone, email, telephone, contacts, contacts_phone, address, school, major, graduation, education, origin, race, marriage, political, remark, user_status, user_type, company_id, record_status, update_count, create_date, creator_id, update_date, updater_id, branch_company_id) values (#{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{entryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{photoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactsPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{graduation,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{education,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{race,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marriage,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{political,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{recordStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updateCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updaterId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{branchCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
